subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Basketball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Judge Michael Levanas ruled that Sterling could not stop the sale of the team that his wife, Rochelle, brokered for a record $2 billion against his wishes.
snippet: Judge Michael Levanas ruled that Sterling could not stop the sale of the team that his wife, Rochelle, brokered for a record $2 billion against his wishes.
